attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Wellington Monument was erected to comemerate the Duke of Wellingtons Victory over the French. In recent years it has been allowed to fall into disrepair by the current owners The National Trust. It now needs major repairs to restore it to it`s former glory. This is a part of the nations history and should not be allowed to  disappear!Wellington Monument stands on the highest point of the Blackdown Hills in the county of Somerset overlooking the town of Wellington . and is a prominant landmark which can be seen for miles around . You cannot travel along the M5 motorway and miss it, so literally millions of people would miss this beatiful monument . please help our cause

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
